item.title: Gaetz, Gabbard and Hegseth: Trump’s Picks Are a Show of Force
item.description: President-elect Donald J. Trump’s cabinet picks show that he prizes loyalty over experience and is fueled by retribution.

item.title: Israel Keeps Up Strikes Near Beirut After 6 Soldiers Are Killed in Lebanon
item.description: The deaths on Wednesday made it one of the most lethal days for the Israeli military since it invaded Lebanon last month to battle Hezbollah fighters.
